item.title: Getting Started Dynamic Window Manager (DWM)
item.author: Author
item.description: Introduction Installing Install Xorg 1 pacman -S xorg-server xorg-xinit xorg-xrandr xorg-xsetroot Install DWM 1 2 3 git clone git://git.suckless.org/dwm ~/.config/dwm git clone git://git.suckless.org/st ~/.config/st git clone git://git.suckless.org/dmenu ~/.config/dmenu 1 2 3 cd ~/.config/dwm && sudo make install cd ~/.config/st && sudo make install cd ~/.config/dmenu && sudo make install Installing a Display Manager (DM) 1 2 3 4 5 pacman -S lightdm pacman -S lightdm-gtk-greeter pacman -S lightdm-gtk-greeter-settings Enable lightdm service 1 sudo systemctl enable lightdm Adding an entry for DWM in the DM Create this file and add the following.
